Kettering.Cox Arboretum and Gardens MetroPark: The Cox Arboretum and Gardens MetroPark (189 acres) is an arboretum and park located at 6733 Springboro Pike, Dayton, Ohio. It is open daily without charge. Cox Arboretum and Gardens MetroPark is one of many Dayton area metroparks within the Five Rivers Metroparks system.
